name: Project Karma. - Version 1.1
description:
Will you rate people?

Will you sentence people to death to save others?

That's all the same here in Tywin Auto-Driving Co.

We believe in "The Greatest Good for the Greatest Number".

You can press "Space" or "Enter" to skip the dialogue in levels

Dialogues in the first scene and last scene can not be skipped.

Background Music: OneShot Original Soundtrack and Piano Guys 

Version 1.1: Add a new scene and ending. fix some bugs.
